subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Devon Allen won the 110-meter hurdles in 13.16 seconds at the United States Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Sacramento after the leader Ronnie Ash fell midway through the race.
snippet: Devon Allen won the 110-meter hurdles in 13.16 seconds at the United States Outdoor Track and Field Championships in Sacramento after the leader Ronnie Ash fell midway through the race.
